column1: Little Goat Diner////The food was really good. However
column2: the service sucks. Pretty typical of the area to be overpriced
column3: and lack the fine dining service. Even the waiters know how bad their wait staff is
column4: one of the other waiters said to our waitress
column5: "you're such a bad waiter." Presumably he was kidding
column6: but still this should paint you picture of the service.
